content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hey Yi-Nuo, glad to meet you. So, about the rental price, I'm thinking of something around 1500 euros per month. Remember, this is just a beautiful city center apartment, nothing fancy.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposition, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because I believe it's slightly higher than what I have anticipated for an unfurnished apartment in this location. Let's explore if we can find a more agreeable price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo, how about 1450 euros then? That's a pretty good deal, I'd say. Remember, this is just an unfurnished apartment in the city center. Not a big deal, right?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While appreciating your effort to reduce the price, I still don't want to continue the negotiation at 1450 Euros per month as it's still not aligning with my expectations for an unfurnished apartment in this area. Let's keep looking for a better agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Okay, Yi-Nuo, how about 1400 euros? I'm sure you'll find this price quite attractive for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. Just remember, it's nothing special.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering your latest proposal, I find myself more satisfied with discussing the rental at 1400 Euros per month for this unfurnished apartment in a prime location. I agree to the price of 1400 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
